title: Arun Jose
text:
I am a Working Student at Siemens Gamesa. I have an extensive background working with SCADA Systems/Projects, Web Development, data analytics to make informed decisions.
I recently expanded my skill set to include topics like Quarto, Power BI, Power Apps(Model Driven Development), working in cross-language R/Python environment and data visualizations using animation and interactivity. I love learning new things constantly and sharing my knowledge with others in a digestible manner.

title: About Me
text:
With a self-directed and detail-oriented approach, I have garnered professional experience in designing, developing, analyzing, and implementing client-server and web-based applications.
My expertise extends to system design, testing, debugging, and modifying application code, ensuring seamless software operation. I possess a keen ability to quickly grasp new programming languages and technologies, enabling me to complete projects within specified deadlines.
In addition to my technical proficiency, I excel in communication, problem-solving, documentation, analytical thinking, and decision-making. These skills enable me to effectively collaborate with teams, address challenges, and deliver high-quality results.
As a dedicated professional, I strive to combine my technical acumen and essential soft skills to drive success in the development and implementation of software solutions. In parallel, I am proud to serve as a Co-Founder of Ad Hoc Healthcare®, a UC Berkeley recognized startup. In this role, I contribute to the strategic vision and development of innovative solutions, showcasing my commitment to entrepreneurship and driving positive change in the healthcare domain.
Please don’t hesitate to reach out if you have any further inquiries or would like to explore potential collaborations.




Technische Universität Chemnitz (2021 - Present)

MSc in in Web Engineering, Computer Science

St. Aloysius Institute of Education, Mangalore (2015 - 2018)

Master in Computer Applications (M.C.A.), Information Technology

Kristu Jyoti College of Management and Information Technology (2013 - 2015)

Bachelor in Commerce (B.Com.) in Computer Applications, Business/Commerce, Computer Applications






Working Student - Software Tool Developer (Siemens Gamesa) (Jan 2023 – Present)

Design, develop, and implement automated workflows using Power Apps Automate.
Collaborate with stakeholders to understand requirements and design workflows that meet business needs.
Troubleshoot and resolve issues related to workflows and automations.
Document workflows and ensure they are aligned with industry best practices.
Stay up-to-date with the latest trends and advancements in Power Apps Automate and related technologies.

Working Student - Software Ecosystem and Marketplace Technologies (Siemens) (Jan 2022 – Dec 2022)

Provided wiki documentation for Software Ecosystem Plugins.
Developed SECO Models examples using MagicDraw.
Utilized Java and Java Swing frameworks for MagicDraw plugin development.
Implemented a customized Java plugin to export UML to XMI files.
Resolved bugs in an existing Java plugin for MagicDraw.
Contributed to a CI/CD pipeline for Java plugins in GitLab.
Employed SECO Modeling to create scenarios, matrices, and relationship diagrams.
Integrated SECO Models into Teamwork Cloud and ensured publication through Cameo Collaborator.

Software Developer (Siemens Gamesa) (Oct 2018 – Oct 2021) (3 yrs 1 mo)

Collaborated with other software engineers from Germany, Denmark and Spain to refactor the code and reduce the code complexity, quality etc.
Experience in developing microservices in Java or .NET using Netflix OSS that runs on a dockerized platform. For Project-KPI we have used microservices with scalable distributed-systems that makes our application more resilient in nature.
Providing support to IT personnel in designing, developing, analyzing, testing, debugging and application deployment
Experience in Kafka message broker’s for managing real-time data from webhooks on an event basis.
Pleasant experience in RDBMS like MSSQL/Postgres SQL and associated SQL Programming Knowledge in creating and maintaining SQL Databases, JDBC, TSQL, DB Tables, Stored Procedures, Views, functions, Triggers and PL/SQL.
Experience using SQL for data extraction and management (MSSQL, PostgreSQL). Also, developed KPI custom reports using R in PowerBI
Improved Data pipeline using Apache Airflow Python DAG’s that significantly improved the quality of data pipelines and notify whenever there is fail-over. Also, this enables us to track over the pipelines on a regular basis.
Created an experimental chat bot using Python’s NLTK library for Project-KPI where Project Manager’s /Owner can get the current status of the projects.
Developed highly interactive web applications utilizing JavaScript, HTML5, CSS, JSON, Java and integrating Restful API’s, external web services ensuring high performance on Mobile and Desktop.
Hands on experience with Azure-IoT Edge and module deployment using docker
Deployment of applications in SIMATIC 227E box using nginx server configuration, mono/ dotnet Core programs and Linux shell scripting
Experienced in Build and Deployment of .NET, Java applications on to different environment like Development, QA, UAT and Production, which includes designing, development and implementation.


Additional Experiences

Investor (Medsoon.in Get Well Soon™) (Mar 2023 – Present)

Investor at Medsoon.in Get Well Soon™, an innovative E-Commerce platform specializing in B2B and B2C healthcare solutions.
Actively involved in shaping the strategic direction and growth of the platform.
Manage and oversee software solutions to enhance the platform’s functionality and user experience.
Contribute to the development of a robust online marketplace for healthcare products and services.
Collaborate with other investors and stakeholders to drive business development initiatives.
Monitor market trends and identify opportunities for expansion and diversification.
Support the platform’s mission to streamline healthcare procurement for businesses and individuals.
Leverage expertise in software management to optimize digital operations and efficiency.
Play a pivotal role in the success and scalability of Medsoon.in Get Well Soon™.

Co-Founder (Ad Hoc Healthcare® - A UC Berkeley Recognized Start-Up) (Apr 2021 – Present)

Lead the Technology, Software Development, and Innovation department.
Drive the development of cutting-edge technological solutions within the healthcare sector.
Spearhead innovation initiatives to revolutionize healthcare through technology.
Collaborate with cross-functional teams to achieve strategic goals.
Oversee software development projects from ideation to implementation.
Foster a culture of innovation and continuous improvement within the organization.
Establish partnerships and collaborations to enhance the company’s technology offerings.
Ensure the alignment of technology and software development with the company’s mission and objectives.

Student Board Member - AI in HCI (Oct 2021 – Jun 2022)

Represented and promoted the AI in HCI conference on various platforms.
Engaged with students for new ideas, tech conversations, and workshops.
Facilitated and organized student meetings, activities, and workshops.
Coordinated the planning with the other volunteer groups.
Assisted in the basic preparation of events/workshops under the supervision of the other program board members.

Software Engineering Intern (Siemens) (Jan 2018 – Oct 2018)

Owned development and releases of internal tools for Siemens Gamesa and Siemens Global Service, India.
Developed software using various web frameworks to meet design specifications and user requirements.
Contributed to project plans, adhering to procedures and standards. Provided support and resolved errors in console and web applications.
Created user guides for end-users and system admins, maintaining all project documentation.
Evaluated the impact of programming changes on the entire system.
Programmed, documented, implemented system enhancements, and maintained legacy applications.

Software Engineering Intern (Siemens) (Jun 2017 – Jul 2017)

Working knowledge of web technologies, but not limited to web frameworks.
Implemented client’s requirements and use cases into functional applications as well as in ensuring their best possible performance, quality, and responsiveness
Design, develop and optimize web applications in a Microsoft based development environment under the direction of senior programmers
Developed new features and functionality for software applications as per requirements as well as in identifying and debugging defects in application code
Meet programming standards by following production, productivity, quality and customer-service standards by identifying work process improvements


Additional Activities

Member of BÜNDNIS 90/DIE GRÜNEN (Jun 2023 – Present)
ACM Special Interest Group on Artificial Intelligence (ACM, Association for Computing Machinery) (Apr 2023 – Present)
ACM Student Member (ACM, Association for Computing Machinery) (Mar 2023 – Present)

Continued professional development through participation in ACM-sponsored training programs, workshops, and online courses.
Leveraged ACM’s resources to stay updated on advancements, research papers, and best practices.
Actively contributed to online community forums, sharing knowledge, and seeking advice from peers.
Participated in national and international conferences and seminars, gaining exposure to cutting-edge research and trends.

Member of European Youth Parliament Germany (Feb 2023 – Present)

Participated in the European Youth Event, collaborating with youth from across Europe.
Collaborated with a diverse team to develop and implement projects addressing youth-related issues.
Conducted research and analysis, providing informed contributions to enhance youth-focused policies.
Engaged in debates, workshops, and panel discussions, fostering dialogue and understanding.
Networked with other youth leaders, policymakers, and influencers, strengthening collaboration.
Continued development through attending conferences, workshops, and training sessions.






Microsoft Power Apps(Model Driven App Development)
.NET Framework, C#

ASP.NET MVC

Microsoft Azure

Data Analysis

Power BI
Python
JavaScript
R





Project Name (Year)

A brief description of your project and its goals.
Mention any technologies used or key achievements.

(Optional) Project Name (Year)

A brief description of your project and its goals.
Mention any technologies used or key achievements.






Email: arunmathewg@outlook.com
(Optional) Website: arunjosegp.github.io/mylife/
(Optional) LinkedIn:linkedin.com/in/arunjosegp/
